attributes.action: stopping or reducing jet aircraft noise over households
attributes.additional_details:
living in a semi urban area in north norfolk i work as a nurse doing a varied shift pattern. on most days there is low flying and noisey jet noise resulting in an inability to sleep before any night shift creating a general distrubance to a peaceful life expirience. the inability to undertake work patterns putting undue stress on me as a nurse with the constant risk of not being able to perform my role as a nurse.
this not only affects my work life it also endagers my patients if i am unable to perform my role due to broken sleep patterns.
I wish the goverment to take action to reduce the amount of flying over households and respect the rights of people to peaceful lifestyle. ensuring any low flying that takes place is in area's that reduce the noise nusiance affects to nornmal peoples working lifes
